caption:
Take it from a girl with thick, low-porosity hair when @0nlyherway says our Curlific! Texture Treatment is a lifesaver💛✨

She uses this treatment to add essential protein and moisture back into her curls that crave it during the winter months! It’s simple to use, leave it in the hair for one minute & rinse it with cool water. Prioritize your natural hair journey in 2025 with #aphogee and take care of your gorgeous mane🦁

Learn more now at the 🔗 in our bio!
